tool_description: Combines dead, live, seismic, and wind loads according to building code load combinations for structural design.

load_combination_type.description: Design method: ASD (allowable stress) or LRFD (load resistance factor)

error_messages: Invalid load combination type: Must be either ASD or LRFD. Check design code requirements.
Negative loads specified: Dead and live loads must be positive. Check load calculations.
Missing required loads: Dead and live loads are mandatory for all combinations.
usage: Input all applicable loads and specify design method. Tool generates all relevant load combinations per building code requirements for structural analysis and design.

combination_values.description: Calculated values for each load combination in kN
